mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board.post (post_id, user_id, post_regdate, post_updatedate, post_heart, title, post_content, filename, post_flag) VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{userId}, #{postRegdate}, #{postUpdatedate}, #{postHeart}, #{title}, #{postContent}, #{filename}, #{postFlag})
mapper.select: SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, post_regdate AS postRegdate, post_updatedate AS postUpdatedate, post_heart AS postHeart, title AS title, post_content AS postContent, filename AS filename, post_flag AS postFlag FROM board.post WHERE post_id = #{postId}

SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, post_regdate AS postRegdate, post_updatedate AS postUpdatedate, post_heart AS postHeart, title AS title, post_content AS postContent, filename AS filename, post_flag AS postFlag FROM board.post WHERE post_flag = "Y" ORDER BY post_regdate DESC

SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, post_regdate AS postRegdate, post_updatedate AS postUpdatedate, post_heart AS postHeart, title AS title, post_content AS postContent, filename AS filename, post_flag AS postFlag FROM board.post WHERE post_flag = "Y" ORDER BY post_regdate DESC LIMIT #{pageNum}, 5
